answer: Full year 2024: Immunology segment sales were USD 9,293 million (or $9.293 billion). This represents an increase of +4% on a reported basis (from $16.6 billion in 2023 Cosentyx Total Net Sales reported by Novartis, according to press releases for Q4 2023 and full year 2023 results) but an increase of +8.96% on a constant currency basis (from the $50.3 billion in FY 2023 (reported in Q4 2023 results) to the $9.293 billion in Full Year 2024 Conservative Currency Segment Sales (found in a Novartis article).
